IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: BRONX CHARTER SCHOOL FOR BETTER LEARNING PROVIDES ITS STUDENTS WITH A SOLID FOUNDATION FOR ACADEMIC SUCCESS, THROUGH ACHIEVEMENTS THAT EXCEEDS CITYWIDE AVERAGES AND MEETS OR EXCEEDS NEW YORK STATE STANDARDS AND NATIONAL NORMS IN ALL CURRICULUM AREAS TESTED.
IRS990.MissionDesc: BRONX CHARTER SCHOOL FOR BETTER LEARNING PROVIDES ITS STUDENTS WITH A SOLID FOUNDATION FOR ACADEMIC SUCCESS, THROUGH ACHIEVEMENTS THAT EXCEEDS CITYWIDE AVERAGES AND MEETS OR EXCEEDS NEW YORK STATE STANDARDS AND NATIONAL NORMS IN ALL CURRICULUM AREAS TESTED.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED STUDENTS WITH A SOLID FOUNDATION FOR ACADEMIC SUCCESS FOR GRADES KINDERGARTEN THROUGH FIFTH GRADE, THROUGH ACHIEVEMENT THAT EXCEEDS CITYWIDE AVERAGES AND MEETS OR EXCEEDS NEW YORK STATE STANDARDS IN ALL CURRICULUM AREAS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CHARTER SCHOOL IS A TAX-EXEMPT CHARTER SCHOOL UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND APPLICABLE STATE REGULATIONS AND, ACCORDINGLY, IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE TAXES ON INCOME. THE CHARTER SCHOOL FILES FORM 990 TAX RETURNS IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION. THE TAX RETURNS FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2015 THROUGH JUNE 30, 2018 ARE STILL SUBJECT TO POTENTIAL AUDIT BY THE IRS. MANAGEMENT OF THE CHARTER SCHOOL BELIEVES IT HAS NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND, ACCORDINGLY IT WILL NOT RECOGNIZE ANY LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS.
THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES FEDERAL AND STATE GRANTS.
THE GOVERNING BODY REVIEWS A SALARY GUIDE TO BE SURE IT IS IN KEEPING WITH THE INDUSTRY AS A WHOLE TO DETERMINE COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD MEMBERS GREG AND WOODY SWAIN HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING BODY REVIEWS THE FORM 990 FOR ACCURACY BEFORE IT IS SUBMITTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING BODY SUBMITS A QUESTIONNAIRE TO EACH OF ITS TRUSTEES, OFFICERS AND HIGHLY COMPENSATED EMPLOYEES REQUESTING INFORMATION RELATING TO ITS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING BODY REVIEWS A SALARY GUIDE TO BE SURE IT IS IN KEEPING WITH THE INDUSTRY AS A WHOLE TO DETERMINE COMPENSATION OF THE CEO, EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIAL AND OTHER OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATIONS BOARD MEETINGS ARE PUBLICALLY HELD ONCE A MONTH AND ANY INFORMATION CAN BE OBTAINED DURING THESE MEETINGS.
THE PROCESS IS CONSISTENT WITH PRIOR YEARS.
